0.01----2
0.01----3
0.01----4
0.01----7
0.01----8
0.01----9
0.01----12
0.01----13
0.01----14
0.01----16
0.060000000000000005----2
0.060000000000000005----3
0.060000000000000005----4
0.060000000000000005----5
0.060000000000000005----6
0.060000000000000005----7
0.060000000000000005----8
0.060000000000000005----9
0.060000000000000005----11



    eps = np.arange(0.01,1,0.05) #eps参数从0.2开始到4，每隔0.2进行一次
    min_samples=np.arange(2,20,1)#min_samples参数从2开始到20
    for i in eps:
        for j in min_samples:
            db = DBSCAN(eps=i, min_samples=j).fit(pca_weights)
            labels= db.labels_
            # print('聚类的种类:', len(pd.Series(db.labels_).value_counts()))
            if len(pd.Series(db.labels_).value_counts()) > 4:
                print(str(i) + "----" + str(j))

 clf = DBSCAN(eps=3.5, min_samples=8)  14



torch pest parameter：
